name: EDUC
description:
Oh look, i made a mod thingy.

Yeah, That's right, I'm back for a second chance. i thought waiting for december was too much. but here i am anyways.

Credits:

Mystman12 - Baldi's Basics, and That Plus Icon, and those Slowed Mrs. Pomp Voicelines which you didn't notice. (Duh..)
ID Software - DOOM
Unknown - Doom Alpha Mods for Doom (Inspiration and SFX?)
GreatAgento/AWEI - SonicOLD.EXE (Loud noises)
Unknown - SMW: The Coronation Day (Water Ambience)
LouisVSFrost - "Inspiration?" of Poppy's Design..?
ThatPoppy/Poppy - Voice?
SpeakoniaTV - RoboButler-3000
Heeno LCC(?) - Crazy Grandpa Math Teacher School (which is the direct inspiration of this mod)
My Friend (Chilly2003) - That Sock Puppet.
RJDMC - The program that makes things sound like it's from the Real NES (..I swear i'm having Taluigi vibes from this one)
and Everyone Else Included in here, just in case.

KEEP IN MIND THIS MOD WILL HAVE A SURPRISE UPDATE IN THE FUTURE, WHICH IS WHY THIS VERSION WAS MADE.
